sentence.Network_en: The warder was always accommodating in allowing visitors in.

sentence.Network_en: The man was accommodating enough to lend me a dollar.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个人很慷慨地借给我一块钱.

sentence.Network_en: They are very accommodating to foreign visitors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们非常乐意帮助外国访客.

entry.tran: 乐于帮助的；与人方便的；肯通融的
entry.def: If you describe someone as accommodating, you like the fact that they are willing to do things in order to please you or help you.

means.word_mean: 1. helpful in bringing about a harmonious adaptation;
